Input guidance

MapReader accepts different formats of digitized maps as input: a. jpeg or png files with associated files containing georeferencing metadata for each sheet b. geoTIFFs containing georeferencing metadata c. layers from tileservers d. non-georeferenced map scans (e.g. jpegs, png, tiff with no metadata to locate the sheet on the earth)
